name: The Lost Maze DX Prototype
description:
The Lost Maze DX is a maze game. The goal is simple, get to the goal. Along the way, you will have to press switches to remove walls and overcome a few other obstacles.

The concept of this prototype is based on an old flash game I made back in my high school years. It was pretty fun, so I think I'm going to take a go at making a full game of it.

That said, I do need some feedback, so I decided to upload the game's prototype here for just that.

Available here are both the android and PC versions of the game. Though the PC version is much better (imo.) I suggest using the PC version if you can.

The prototype has 6 playable characters, and 38 stages of varying lengths and difficulty. It also has a level select feature for easy access. 

With that in mind, I hope you give my game prototype a try, and I hope you enjoy it too! Please leave any and all feedback that you can think of that may help with the development of the full game, I'd greatly appreciate it!

Feel free to comment right here, or reach out to me on Twitter (https://twitter.com/ElijahTully25) if that's more your speed.

And that's all for now, so thanks a lot for trying out my game prototype!
